page.title: 18St. Lawrences School
page.content: At St.Lawrences School, Skellingthorpe there are 156 children and six classrooms including one music room. It has a hall, a playground and a field for games. There are two huts. One has three classrooms and a cloakroom. The other hut has a pottery room and a caretakers room. The main school has two classrooms, a hall and a music room. The school has four teachers, one part time teacher and a headmaster. School starts at 8.55am and for infants ends at 3.15pm and for juniors at 3.40pm. There are some school clubs including country dancing, violin and guitar. Dinner time for infants is 11.55 and for the juniors 12.30. It is one of the few schools in Lincolnshire which still has school dinners. There is a school uniform but children do not have to wear it.
